#summary Release Notes for Version 1.1
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

Find below all changes, fixes and new features for Version 1.1 compared to the last version


= Details =

*Changes*

  * Upgraded HighCharts.js to latest version
  * Improved support for extender, also added to showcase

*Fixes*

  * Fixed issue for resource handling when no PrimeFaces was present
  * Fixed issue in resource handling, when several Charts were on the same page

*Features*

  * Added support for HeatMap
  * Added support for TreeMap both single level and multi level
  * Added TreeMapLevel component for individually defining TreeMap levels
